channel.title: tutorrrial on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in tutorrrial on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme

item.title: Tags
item.description: Arrr! Pirrrates Fello' pirrates, be awarrre some featurrres may not work fer us in this trrranslat'n. Like table of rrramblings, some Merrrmaids and stuff. Th' Relearrrn theme supports one default taxonomy o' Cap'n Hugo: th' tag feature. Configurat'n Just add tags t' any plank: +++ tags = ["tutorial", "theme"] title = "Theme tutorial" weight = 15 +++ Behavior Th' tags be displayed at th' top o' th' plank, 'n their insert'n order.
